verses.text_madani: اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The hour drew nigh and the moon did rend asunder.

verses.text_madani: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: And if they see a miracle they turn aside and say: Transient magic.

verses.text_madani: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And they call (it) a lie, and follow their low desires; and every affair has its appointed term.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: And certainly some narratives have come to them wherein is prevention--

verses.text_madani: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: Consummate wisdom-- but warnings do not avail;

verses.text_madani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: So turn (your) back on them (for) the day when the inviter shall invite them to a hard task,

verses.text_madani: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: Their eyes cast down, going forth from their graves as if they were scattered locusts,

verses.text_madani: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: Hastening to the inviter. The unbelievers shall say: This is a hard day.

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: Before them the people of Nuh rejected, so they rejected Our servant and called (him) mad, and he was driven away.

verses.text_madani: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
verses.translation: Therefore he called upon his Lord: I am overcome, come Thou then to help.

verses.text_madani: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: So We opened the gates of the cloud with water pouring

verses.text_madani: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: And We made water to flow forth in the land in springs, so the water gathered together according to a measure already ordained.

verses.text_madani: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: And We bore him on that which was made of planks and nails

verses.text_madani: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: Sailing, before Our eyes, a reward for him who was denied.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And certainly We left it as a sign, but is there anyone who

verses.text_madani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How (great) was then My punishment and My warning!

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And certainly We have made the Quran easy for remembrance, but is there anyone who will mind?

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Ad treated (the truth) as a lie, so how (great) was My punishment and My warning!

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: Surely We sent on them a tornado in a day of bitter ill-luck

verses.text_madani: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: Tearing men away as if they were the trunks of palm-trees torn up.

verses.text_madani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How (great) was then My punishment and My warning!

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And certainly We have made the Quran easy for remembrance, but is there anyone who will mind?

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Samood rejected the warning.

verses.text_madani: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: So they said: What! a single mortal from among us! Shall we follow him? Most surely we shall in that case be in sure error and distress:

verses.text_madani: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: Has the reminder been made to light upon him from among us? Nay! he is an insolent liar!

verses.text_madani: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: Tomorrow shall they know who is the liar, the insolent one.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: Surely We are going to send the she-camel as a trial for them; therefore watch them and have patience.

verses.text_madani: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: And inform them that the water is shared between them; every share of the water shall be regulated.

verses.text_madani: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called their companion, so he took (the sword) and slew (her).

verses.text_madani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How (great) was then My punishment and My warning!

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: Surely We sent upon them a single cry, so they were like the dry fragments of trees which the maker of an enclosure collects.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And certainly We have made the Quran easy for remembrance, but is there anyone who will mind?

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lut treated the warning. as a lie.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: Surely We sent upon them a stonestorm, except Lut's followers; We saved them a little before daybreak,

verses.text_madani: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: A favor from Us; thus do We reward him who gives thanks.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: And certainly he warned them of Our violent seizure, but they obstinately disputed the warning.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And certainly they endeavored to turn him from his guests, but We blinded their eyes; so taste My chastisement and My warning.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And certainly a lasting chastisement overtook them in the morning.

verses.text_madani: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So taste My chastisement and My warning.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And certainly We have made the Quran easy for remembrance, but is there anyone who will mind?

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: And certainly the warning came to Firon's people.

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: They rejected all Our communications, so We overtook them after the manner of a Mighty, Powerful One.

verses.text_madani: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are the unbelievers of yours better than these, or is there an exemption for you in the scriptures?

verses.text_madani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Or do they say: We are a host allied together to help each other?

verses.text_madani: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: Soon shall the hosts be routed, and they shall turn (their) backs.

verses.text_madani: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: Nay, the hour is their promised time, and the hour shall be most grievous and bitter.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: Surely the guilty are in error and distress.

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: On the day when they shall be dragged upon their faces into the fire; taste the touch of hell.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: Surely We have created everything according to a measure.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our command is but one, as the twinkling of an eye.
